ngl::Vec3 calSpringForces ()
 method to calculate the spring forces F = -k(|x|-d)(x/|x|) - bv where k is the spring constant |x| is the distance between the two spring points d is the distance of seperation b is the coefficient of damping larger b increases the damping force v is the relative velocity between the spring points

Member Function Documentation

ngl::Vec3 ClothSpring::calSpringForces (  ) 

method to calculate the spring forces F = -k(|x|-d)(x/|x|) - bv where k is the spring constant |x| is the distance between the two spring points d is the distance of seperation b is the coefficient of damping larger b increases the damping force v is the relative velocity between the spring points

Returns:
a vector of the force calculated via the RK4 integrator

Definition at line 32 of file ClothSpring.cpp.

References ClothParticle::getPosition(), ClothParticle::getVelocity(), m_damping, m_k, m_posA, m_posB, and m_restLen.

00033 {
00034     ngl::Vec3 velocity = m_posB->getVelocity() - m_posA->getVelocity();
00035     ngl::Vec3 distance = m_posB->getPosition() - m_posA->getPosition();
00036     float length = distance.length();
00037     return -m_k*(length-m_restLen)*(distance/length)-m_damping*velocity;
00038 }
